title: Penetration Tester - Network Security
body:
Company Description

SGS Digital Trust Services provides Cybersecurity research, testing and certification services. Working in partnership with Graz University of Technology (TU Graz) at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz, we operate one of the world's largest Cyber security evaluation labs where security experts focus on testing and certification of digital products, networked systems and online services.


Job Description

The Penetration Tester will evaluate security vulnerabilities in IoT devices and networks. Your job will be to find weaknesses and assess their severity.

You will:

  • Test the vulnerability of the connectivity and Software layer on electronic products and systems;
  • Perform network penetration, web, mobile and application testing;
  • Conduct source code reviews, threat analysis and wireless network assessments;
  • Develop scripts, tools or methodologies to facilitate customized testing.

Qualifications
  • Degree, Masters or PhD in Information Technology, Informatics, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Computer Science Mathematics or a related subject;
  • OSCP certified (preferred);
  • Acunetix, OpenVAS, Nessus, NMap, Metasploit and Burp Suite experience;
  • Knowledge of OWASP Top 10;
  • Experience of conducting penetration tests of enterprise networks and environments, web applications and IoT devices;
  • Knowledge of network security protocols and fuzzing;
  • Background with testing standards like Common Criteria or UL 2900;
  • Conducting cybersecurity assessment and audits.

Additional Information

You must be an EU or NATO citizen to be eligible for employment at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz.
